structure.unit: AGRICULTURAL SEEDS, FEEDING STUFFS, AND FERTILIZERS

law.text: The department's authorized representative shall have the authority to enter upon public and private premises or to stop public and private conveyances except common carriers for the purpose of inspection and to obtain samples of agricultural limestone.
law.history: Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 160, sec. 5, effective June 16, 1960.
